text.div:
My likes / joys:

Here are some examples of the things that I would like to have near me, music that I’d like to hear, and other details of my care that would help to keep me happy and relaxed:

I love the smell of lavender and the feeling of sunshine on my face.

valueString: Here are some examples of the things that I would like to have near me, music that I’d like to hear, and other details of my care that would help to keep me happy and relaxed: I love the smell of lavender and the feeling of sunshine on my face.
